params.en:
[ApRow form_id="form_6870104261674850" class="row box-titlefaq" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_11872225475268422" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_42255730883730445" xl="8" lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_5815100630510553" accordion_type="full" active="1" content_html="

Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to suport@prestashop.com

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_13060443827228702" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_19110708739308985" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_42643926109675675" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6450098009856904" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="Will your template be fully compatible with Prestashop?" content_html="

Yes it is.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9783258662871026" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title=" I cannot upload the theme to my Prestashop store / Prestashop alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem? " content_html="

Please make sure that you follow below steps:

_APENTER_

1/ Download the theme from https://addons.prestashop.com (the file is in theme_name.zip format)

_APENTER_

2/ Upload file to host ROOT/themes/theme_name.zip

_APENTER_

3/ In admin go to Design -_APAMP_gt; Theme _APAMP_ Logo -_APAMP_gt; click _APOBRACKET_Add new theme_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; sroll down to bottom will see _APOBRACKET_Select the archive_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; chose theme_name.zip -_APAMP_gt; _APOBRACKET_Save_APCBRACKET_

_APENTER_

4/ Active theme was unzip in step 3 in Design -? Theme _APAMP_ Logo

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5409840402182666" accordion_type="accordion" title="What I have to do when I need your support?" content_html="

To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

_APENTER_

1. screenshot your issue _APPLUS_ URL.

_APENTER_

2. send me backOffice _APPLUS_ Ftp for me can quick check and fix for you.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9662675874205456" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title=" Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?" sub_title="" content_html="

Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@prestashop.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
params.fr:
[ApRow form_id="form_6870104261674850" class="row box-titlefaq" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_11872225475268422" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_42255730883730445" xl="8" lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_5815100630510553" accordion_type="full" active="1" content_html="
"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_13060443827228702" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_19110708739308985" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_42643926109675675" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6450098009856904" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="Votre modèle sera entièrement compatible avec Prestashop ?" content_html="
Oui.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9783258662871026" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title=" Je ne peux pas télécharger le thème pour ma boutique Prestashop / Prestashop avertit que le fichier est trop gros à télécharger, quel est le problème ? " content_html="

S_APAPOST_il vous plaît assurez-vous que vous suivez les étapes ci-dessous:

_APENTER_

1 / Téléchargez le thème depuis https://addons.prestashop.com (le fichier est au format theme_name.zip)

_APENTER_

2 / Charger le fichier sur l_APAPOST_hôte ROOT / themes / theme_name.zip

_APENTER_

3 / Dans admin allez dans Design -_APAMP_gt; Theme _APAMP_ Logo -_APAMP_gt; cliquez sur _APOBRACKET_Ajouter un nouveau thème_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; sroll vers le bas verrez _APOBRACKET_Sélectionnez l_APAPOST_archive_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; choisissez theme_name.zip -_APAMP_gt; _APOBRACKET_Save_APCBRACKET_

_APENTER_

4 / Le thème actif était décompressé à l_APAPOST_étape 3 dans Design -? Thème et logo

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5409840402182666" accordion_type="accordion" title="Ce que je dois faire lorsque j’ai besoin de votre soutien ?" content_html="

Pour économiser votre temps et atteindre notre support rapidement, veuillez suivre les étapes ci-dessous:

_APENTER_

1. capturez votre problème _APPLUS_ URL.

_APENTER_

2. envoyez-moi backOffice _APPLUS_ Ftp pour moi peut rapidement vérifier et réparer pour vous.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9662675874205456" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title=" Offrez-vous les gars des services de personnalisation pour vos thèmes ?" sub_title="" content_html="

Oui, nous le faisons. Veuillez envoyer vos demandes de personnalisation à support@prestashop.com, nous vous donnerons notre devis. Merci.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
params.de:
[ApRow form_id="form_6870104261674850" class="row box-titlefaq" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_11872225475268422" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_42255730883730445" xl="8" lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_5815100630510553" accordion_type="full" active="1" content_html="
"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_13060443827228702" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_19110708739308985" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_42643926109675675" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6450098009856904" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="Werden Ihre Vorlage vollständig kompatibel mit Prestashop?" content_html="
Ja ist es.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9783258662871026" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title=" Hochladen ich kann das Thema nicht zu meinem Prestashop Speicher / alarmiert Prestashop, dass die Datei zu groß zum Hochladen, was ist das Problem? " content_html="

Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie die folgenden Schritte befolgen:

_APENTER_

1 / Laden Sie das Theme von https://addons.prestashop.com herunter (die Datei ist im Format theme_name.zip)

_APENTER_

2 / Datei hochladen, um ROOT / themes / theme_name.zip zu hosten

_APENTER_

3 / In admin gehe zu Design -_APAMP_gt; Theme _APAMP_ Logo -_APAMP_gt; klicke auf _APOBRACKET_Neues Thema hinzufügen_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; wähle bis zum Ende nach unten _APOBRACKET_Wähle das Archiv_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; wähle theme_name.zip -_APAMP_gt; _APOBRACKET_Save_APCBRACKET_

_APENTER_

4 / Aktives Thema wurde in Schritt 3 in Design entpackt -? Thema _APAMP_ Logo

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5409840402182666" accordion_type="accordion" title="Was muss ich tun, wenn ich Ihre Unterstützung brauche?" content_html="

Um Zeit zu sparen und unseren Support schnell zu erreichen, folgen Sie bitte den folgenden Schritten:

_APENTER_

1. screenshot Ihre Ausgabe _APPLUS_ URL.

_APENTER_

2. Senden Sie mir backOffice _APPLUS_ Ftp für mich kann schnell überprüfen und für Sie reparieren.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9662675874205456" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title=" Bieten euch Customization Services für Ihre Themen?" sub_title="" content_html="

Ja, wir tun. Senden Sie bitte Ihre Anpassung Anfragen an support@prestashop.com, wir werden Ihnen unser Angebot. Danke.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
params.it:
[ApRow form_id="form_6870104261674850" class="row box-titlefaq" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_11872225475268422" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_42255730883730445" xl="8" lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_5815100630510553" accordion_type="full" active="1" content_html="
"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_13060443827228702" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_19110708739308985" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_42643926109675675" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6450098009856904" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="Il modello sarà completamente compatibile con Prestashop?" content_html="
Sì lo è.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9783258662871026" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title=" Non riesco a caricare il tema al mio negozio Prestashop / Prestashop avvisa che il file è troppo grande per caricare, qual è il problema? " content_html="

Assicurati di seguire i seguenti passaggi:

_APENTER_

1 / Scarica il tema da https://addons.prestashop.com (il file è in formato theme_name.zip)

_APENTER_

2 / Carica il file per ospitare ROOT / themes / theme_name.zip

_APENTER_

3 / In admin vai su Design -_APAMP_gt; Tema e logo -_APAMP_gt; fai clic su _APOBRACKET_Aggiungi nuovo tema_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; sroll down to bottom vedrà _APOBRACKET_Seleziona l_APAPOST_archivio_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; scegli theme_name.zip -_APAMP_gt; _APOBRACKET_Save_APCBRACKET_

_APENTER_

4 / Il tema attivo è stato decompresso nel passaggio 3 in Design -? Tema e logo

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5409840402182666" accordion_type="accordion" title="Che cosa devo fare quando ho bisogno del tuo sostegno?" content_html="

Per risparmiare tempo e raggiungere rapidamente il nostro supporto, segui i passaggi seguenti:

_APENTER_

1. screenshot il tuo problema _APPLUS_ URL.

_APENTER_

2. mandami indietroOffice _APPLUS_ Ftp per me può controllare rapidamente e risolvere per voi.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9662675874205456" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title=" Ragazzi, Offrite servizi di personalizzazione per i temi?" sub_title="" content_html="

Sì, lo facciamo. Si prega di inviare le vostre richieste di personalizzazione a support@prestashop.com, vi daremo il nostro preventivo. Grazie.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
params.es:
[ApRow form_id="form_6870104261674850" class="row box-titlefaq" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_11872225475268422" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_42255730883730445" xl="8" lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_5815100630510553" accordion_type="full" active="1" content_html="
"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_13060443827228702" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_19110708739308985" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_42643926109675675" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6450098009856904" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="¿Será la plantilla totalmente compatible con Prestashop?" content_html="
Sí.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9783258662871026" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title=" No puedo cargar el tema en mi tienda Prestashop / Prestashop avisa que el archivo es demasiado grande para cargar, ¿cuál es el problema? " content_html="

Por favor, asegúrese de seguir los siguientes pasos:

_APENTER_

1 / Descargue el tema desde https://addons.prestashop.com (el archivo está en formato theme_name.zip)

_APENTER_

2 / Subir archivo al host ROOT / themes / theme_name.zip

_APENTER_

3 / En el administrador, vaya a Diseño -_APAMP_gt; Tema y logotipo -_APAMP_gt; haga clic en _APOBRACKET_Agregar nuevo tema_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; desplácese hacia abajo para ver _APOBRACKET_Seleccionar el archivo_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; elija nombre_tema.zip -_APAMP_gt; _APOBRACKET_Guardar_APCBRACKET_

_APENTER_

4 / El tema activo se descomprimió en el paso 3 en Diseño -? Tema y logotipo

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5409840402182666" accordion_type="accordion" title="¿Lo que tengo que hacer cuando necesito su apoyo?" content_html="

Para ahorrar tiempo y llegar a nuestro soporte rápidamente, siga los pasos a continuación:

_APENTER_

1. captura de pantalla su problema _APPLUS_ URL.

_APENTER_

2. envíenme a BackOffice _APPLUS_ Ftp para que pueda verificarlo rápidamente y arreglarlo para usted.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9662675874205456" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title=" ¿Chicos ofrecen servicios de personalización para tus temas?" sub_title="" content_html="

Sí, lo hacemos. Por favor envíe sus peticiones de personalización a support@prestashop.com, nosotros le dará nuestra cotización. Gracias.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
params.ar:
[ApRow form_id="form_6870104261674850" class="row box-titlefaq" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_11872225475268422" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_42255730883730445" xl="8" lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_5815100630510553" accordion_type="full" active="1" content_html="
"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_13060443827228702" xl="2" lg="2" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_19110708739308985" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_42643926109675675" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6450098009856904" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="القالب الخاص بك سوف تكون متوافقة تماما مع Prestashop؟" content_html="
نعم إنه كذلك.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9783258662871026" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title=" أنا لا يمكن تحميل الموضوع إلى بلدي تخزين Prestashop/Prestashop تنبيهات أن الملف كبير جداً لتحميل، ما هي المشكلة؟ " content_html="

يرجى التأكد من اتباع الخطوات التالية:

_APENTER_

1 / قم بتنزيل السمة من https://addons.prestashop.com (الملف بتنسيق theme_name.zip)

_APENTER_

2 / تحميل الملف لاستضافة ROOT / themes / theme_name.zip

_APENTER_

3 / في admin انتقل إلى Design -_APAMP_gt; Theme _APAMP_ Logo -_APAMP_gt; click _APOBRACKET_Add new theme_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; sroll down to bottom will see _APOBRACKET_Select the archive_APCBRACKET_ -_APAMP_gt; choose theme_name.zip -_APAMP_gt; _APOBRACKET_Save_APCBRACKET_

_APENTER_

4 / موضوع نشط كان بفك في الخطوة 3 في التصميم -؟ الموضوع والشعار

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5409840402182666" accordion_type="accordion" title="ما يجب القيام به عندما أحتاج إلى دعمكم؟" content_html="

لتوفير وقتك والوصول إلى دعمنا بسرعة ، يرجى اتباع الخطوات أدناه:

_APENTER_

1. لقطة شاشة لمشكلتك _APPLUS_ عنوان URL.

_APENTER_

2. أرسل لي backOffice _APPLUS_ Ftp بالنسبة لي يمكن التحقق بسرعة وإصلاح بالنسبة لك.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9662675874205456" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title=" هل الرجال تقدم خدمات التخصيص للمواضيع الخاصة بك؟" sub_title="" content_html="

نعم، نحن نفعل. يرجى إرسال طلبات التخصيص الخاص بك إلى support@prestashop.com، وسوف نقدم لكم عرض الأسعار لدينا. شكرا.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
